long_description: The Sanuk Army Brat slip-on shoes feature a fun camo print that's sure to please. They'll love the great fit and easy style of these shoes! Billed as a sandal-shoe hybrid from the Sanuk Sidewalk Surfer line, Army Brat slip-ons are cotton canvas uppers on sandal bottoms. Cotton linings are soft against bare feet. Rip-and-stick flap design makes getting these on and off an easy task. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption and stability. EVA midsoles and rubber outsoles offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on. All-synthetic construction makes the Sanuk Army Brat slip-on shoes vegan friendly.
